ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Contract Id is populated when stage is moved to executed or discontinued.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="International_Projects_Unit", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Contract"), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Executed"),ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discontinued")), ISBLANK(CLMS_Contract_ID__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CLMS Contract ID is a Mandatory Field
